translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
welcome to Beyoncé Homecoming 2018.
[crowd] Beychella! Beychella! Beychella!
[crowd chanting] Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
Beyoncé! Beyoncé! Beyoncé!
-Coachella. You ready? -[crowd cheers]
[Beyoncé] Let's go get 'em.
Coachella, y'all dance with me. Come on. Hey!
Come on!
Do you slay?
[Nina Simone] I think what you're trying to ask is, uh,
why am I so insistent upon...
giving out to them that Blackness,
that Black Power, that Black--
Pushing them to identify
with, uh, Black culture.
I think that is what you're asking.
translation.it: È questo che mi stai chiedendo.

translation.en: I have no choice over it in the first place.
translation.it: In primo luogo, non ho scelta.

translation.en: To me, we are the most beautiful creatures in the whole world;
translation.it: Secondo me, siamo le creature più belle del mondo:

translation.en: Black people.
My job is to somehow
translation.it: Il mio compito è, in qualche modo...

translation.en: make them curious enough, or persuade them,
by hook or crook,
to get more aware of themselves and where they came from
translation.it: a diventare più consapevoli di sé stessi e delle loro origini

translation.en: and what they are into, and what is already there
translation.it: e capire cosa sono capaci di fare, e cosa esiste già

translation.en: and just to bring it out.
This is what compels me to compel them.
translation.it: È questo che stimola me a stimolare loro.

translation.en: And I will do it by whatever means necessary.
translation.it: E lo farò, ad ogni costo.

translation.en: Which one do you think is better?
[man] I mean, I think we could use another music run-through...
translation.it: Dovremmo fare un'altra prova per la musica...

translation.en: Okay. [man] And get all the departments because...
the people who haven't seen the show, like seen the run-through over there,
translation.it: ...chi non ha visto lo show, la prova laggiù,

translation.en: are super unclear on what the vibe is.
-What this is. -[man] Yeah.
Agreed.
I'm with you. [man] People who have just saw it...
Then they got it. They just now getting it. Got it.
[Beyoncé] Okay, so can we see if it's a good time to do that?
[woman] They can be here til' eight.
-What time is it? -[woman] It's 6:30.
[man 2] Let's go.
-[woman 2] Go over there? -[woman 3] Yeah.
[Beyoncé] I grew up in Houston, Texas,
visiting Prairie View.
We rehearsed at TSU
translation.it: Abbiamo provato alla Texas Southern University

translation.en: for many years in Third Ward,
translation.it: per tanti anni nel Third Ward,

translation.en: and I always dreamed of going to an HBCU.
translation.it: e ho sempre sognato di andare a una storica università afroindiana.

translation.en: My college was Destiny's Child.
translation.it: Il mio college è stato le Destiny's Child.

translation.en: My college was traveling around the world, and life was my teacher.
translation.it: Il mio college è stato viaggiare e la vita è stata la mia insegnante.

translation.en: I wanted a Black orchestra.
I wanted the steppers, I needed the vocalists.
translation.it: Volevo i ballerini, mi servivano dei cantanti.

translation.en: I wanted different characters; I didn't want us all doing the same thing.
translation.it: Volevo personalità diverse, non volevo che facessimo le stesse cose.

translation.en: And the amount of swag is just limitless. Like...
translation.it: E il fascino è illimitato. Come...

translation.en: the things that these young people can do
translation.it: ...le cose che questi giovani sanno fare

translation.en: with their bodies, and the music they can play, and...
translation.it: con i loro corpi, e la musica che suonano e...

translation.en: the drumrolls, and the haircuts, and the bodies, and the...
translation.it: ...i rulli di tamburo, le acconciature, e i loro corpi e...

translation.en: It's just not right.
It's just so much damn swag.
It's just gorgeous, and it makes me proud. And, um...
translation.it: È magnifico e mi rende orgogliosa.

translation.en: I wanted every person that has ever been dismissed
translation.it: Volevo che tutte le persone che sono state rifiutate

translation.en: because of the way they look
to feel like they were on that stage.
translation.it: si sentissero come se fossero sul palco.

translation.en: Killing 'em. Killing 'em.
And I want this to be, uh...
an experience where we all have growth,
we all have to push ourselves and have to dig deep inside of ourselves
translation.it: per cui dobbiamo impegnarci e dobbiamo scavare dentro di noi

translation.en: to become better human beings.
And I wanna start off with a prayer.
translation.it: E voglio cominciare con una preghiera.

translation.en: All right.
God, thank you so much for everyone here.
translation.it: Dio, grazie per le persone che sono qui.

translation.en: Thank you for bringing all of these human beings into my life.
translation.it: Grazie per aver portato questi esseri umani nella mia vita.

translation.en: God, I ask that this is an experience that...
translation.it: Dio, chiedo che questa sia un'esperienza che...

translation.en: we all remember forever.
I ask that we're able to touch people and give them hope.
translation.it: Dobbiamo emozionare la gente e darle speranza.

translation.en: To make people feel beautiful, strong...
and united.
God, I ask that you just use us.
translation.it: Dio, ti chiedo solo di usarci.

translation.en: I ask that we all grow, and we all connect.
translation.it: Aiutaci a crescere e a essere uniti.

translation.en: And Lord, thank you so much for choosing us.
translation.it: E Signore, grazie per aver scelto noi.

translation.en: Thank you for bringing everyone here into my life.
translation.it: Grazie per aver portato tutti loro nella mia vita.

translation.en: We give you all the praise and glory, amen.
translation.it: Ti lodiamo e ti onoriamo, Amen.

translation.en: [company] Amen.
[Beyoncé] So, I want us to have fun
and just, we have so much to learn.
'Cause we're here to rehearse,
translation.it: Siamo qui per fare le prove,

translation.en: and eventually we'll get on that stage and just let it all go,
translation.it: e saliremo su quel palco e ci lasceremo andare,

translation.en: and feel the spirit and have us a good time.
translation.it: e sentiremo lo spirito e ci divertiremo.

translation.en: But, right now, it's still janky,
translation.it: Ma, per ora, fa ancora pena,

translation.en: and we got so much to learn and work out.
translation.it: e abbiamo molto da imparare e da perfezionare.

translation.en: So I wanted us to feel each other's energy,
and dance, and scream, and holler, and hoot.
Do whatever we feel naturally.
translation.it: facciamo quello che ci viene naturale.

translation.en: And we're gonna build this thing together.
So let's just do it.
Let me hear you sing.
Bug a Boos.
I need a good laugh.
You.
Make me laugh.
Bug a Boos!
We got you, right?
[Bug a Boo] That is so funny!
Did that make us laugh?
[group and crowd] No!
Think about it.
Bug a Boos!
Fall in line.
Ladies.
Ladies.
Ladies.
Are we smart?
[audience] Yes!
Are we strong?
[audience]Yes!
Have we had enough of the bullshit?
Show me.
[crowd chanting] Suck...
On my balls!
Suck on my balls!
Suck on my balls, bitch!
Suck...
On my balls!
Suck on my balls, pause!
I see you. How did you do that so fast? She has on my outfit, y'all.
translation.it: Ti vedo. Come hai fatto a farlo così velocemente? Ha il mio costume.

translation.en: Sing it, ladies.
Right, ladies?
[Beyoncé] Yes.
Thank y'all so much for having us once again.
translation.it: Grazie a tutti per averci voluto di nuovo.

translation.en: I'm so honored to be on this stage tonight.
translation.it: Sono onorata di essere su questo palco.

translation.en: This next song is for all of my queens.
translation.it: La prossima canzone è per le mie regine.

translation.en: Do we have any beautiful queens in the house tonight?
translation.it: Ci sono delle belle regine qui stasera?

translation.en: I want y'all to sing along if you know the lyrics.
translation.it: Cantate con me, se sapete le parole.

translation.en: It's called "Bow Down."
Listen.
[Beyoncé] Do one more!
[Beyoncé] When I decided to do Coachella,
translation.it: Quando ho deciso di fare Coachella...

translation.en: instead of me pulling out my flower crown,
translation.it: ...anziché tirar fuori la mia coroncina di fiori...

translation.en: it was more important that I brought our culture to Coachella.
translation.it: ...ho pensato fosse più importante portare la nostra cultura a Coachella.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] There was a four-month period
translation.it: C'è stato un periodo di quattro mesi...

translation.en: of rehearsals
with Derek and the band before we started
translation.it: ...con Derek e il gruppo, prima che iniziassero

translation.en: the four months of dance rehearsals.
translation.it: i quattro mesi di prove di danza.

translation.en: The music and those vocal rehearsals--
translation.it: Le prove per la musica e il canto...

translation.en: that's the heartbeat of the show.
I wanted all of these different characters,
and I wanted it to feel the way I felt
translation.it: ...e volevo provare quello che ho provato

translation.en: when I went to battle of the bands,
translation.it: quando sono andata a Battle of the Bands,

translation.en: because I grew up seeing those shows, and that being the highlight of my year.
translation.it: perché crescendo guardavo quello show, ed era il momento più bello dell'anno.

translation.en: [choreographer] Five, six, seven, go.
Five, swipe, right, left,
swipe, step, clap.
[Beyoncé] So I studied my history, I studied my past,
translation.it: Perciò ho studiato la mia storia, il mio passato,

translation.en: and I put every mistake,
translation.it: e ho messo tutti i miei errori,

translation.en: all of my triumphs,
of my 22-year career
into my two-hour homecoming performance.
translation.it: nella mia performance di homecoming di due ore.

translation.en: [man] Looking at what she wanted to bring to the community,
translation.it: Pensare a cosa volesse dare alla comunità,

translation.en: and caring about current events,
and caring about what, you know, her people are going through,
translation.it: e per le difficoltà che la sua gente deve affrontare

translation.en: and wanting to shed light,
translation.it: e al suo voler far luce

translation.en: and wanting to put, you know, a proud moment on stage for us,
translation.it: per regalarci un momento d'orgoglio sul palco,

translation.en: it gives you a boost. It's like, "Wow!"
translation.it: ti dà la carica. È come: "Wow!"

translation.en: [man] They heard her say it without saying it.
translation.it: L'hanno sentita senza bisogno che lo dicesse a parole: "Mettiamolo su.

translation.en: "Let's get it together. Let's move forward, let's unify."
translation.it: L'hanno sentita senza bisogno che lo dicesse a parole: "Mettiamolo su. Andiamo avanti, uniamoci".

translation.en: All of those things existed in this performance.
translation.it: Tutte queste cose erano nello spettacolo.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] It felt like we were all connected,
and it literally felt like we were in our own university
translation.it: e sembrava fossimo in un'università tutta nostra

translation.en: and struggling together.
The hours were unbelievable.
[Beyoncé] We did a pass without any music.
And just to hear the energy in all the stops, and...
translation.it: E solo sentire l'energia in tutti i passaggi

translation.en: to feel the shaking of the risers on the pyramid,
translation.it: e sentire le vibrazioni dei montanti della piramide,

translation.en: to hear the harmonies live was just as entertaining.
translation.it: sentire le armonie dal vivo è stato altrettanto bello.

translation.en: Coachella, I wanna hear y'all sing.
How y'all doing over here?
I can see you all the way. All the way back there.
translation.it: Vi vedo tutti. Vedo tutti fino al fondo.

translation.en: Sing it, y'all!
Sing.
-[Beyoncé] Come on, sing! -[audience continues vocalizing]
-Sing. -[audience vocalizes]
-Sing it. -[audience vocalizes]
[Beyoncé] Sing it.
Say, "I'm-a a diva." Sing it.
-Say, "I'm-a a diva." Sing it. -[audience] ♪ I'm-a a diva ♪
-Louder. "I'm-a a diva." Louder. -[audience] ♪ I'm-a a diva ♪
Can't hear you. "I'm-a a diva."
-Sing it. -[audience] ♪ I'm-a a diva ♪
Come on.
Divas, y'all help me sing this next verse?
translation.it: Dive, cantate con me la prossima strofa?

translation.en: Here we go.
[Beyoncé] I was supposed to do Coachella the year prior.
But...
I got pregnant unexpectedly.
And it ended up being twins,
which was even more of a surprise.
translation.it: ...e fu una sorpresa ancora più grande.

translation.en: My body went through more than I knew it could.
translation.it: Il mio corpo ha sopportato più di quanto pensavo potesse.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] I was 218 pounds the day I gave birth.
translation.it: Pesavo 99 chili il giorno del parto.

translation.en: I had an extremely difficult pregnancy.
translation.it: Ho avuto una gravidanza molto difficile.

translation.en: I had high blood pressure,
I developed toxemia, preeclampsia,
and, in the womb,
one of my babies' heartbeat paused a few times,
translation.it: il battito cardiaco di uno dei bimbi si è fermato un po' di volte,

translation.en: so I had to get an emergency C-section.
translation.it: perciò ho avuto un cesareo d'urgenza.

translation.en: [Toni Morrison] Home is something very peculiar.
translation.it: La casa è una cosa molto particolare.

translation.en: There is a yearning in it, you know?
translation.it: C'è un desiderio in essa, sai?

translation.en: Something special, mystical, hopeful,
restful.
-Here we go.First combination. -[choreographer laughs]
translation.it: PRIMA PROVA POST PARTO Ci siamo. Prima combinazione.

translation.en: -First... -[cheers] I been getting to.
That go:
I been getting to.
[Beyoncé] It's my first time back home,
translation.it: È la prima volta che torno a casa,

translation.en: on the stage, after giving birth.
I'm creating my own homecoming.
And it's hard.
There were days that I thought, you know, I'd never be the same.
translation.it: In certi giorni pensavo che non sarei più stata come prima.

translation.en: I'd never be the same physically,
translation.it: Che non avrei avuto il fisico,

translation.en: my strength and endurance would never be the same.
translation.it: che non avrei avuto la forza e resistenza di prima.

translation.en: [man] Between SoulCycle and coming in here,
-you're losing like 1,500-2,000 calories. -[Beyoncé] Calories, yeah.
It's true. And, eventually,
I wanna be able to do SoulCycle, the stairs, and rehearse in a day.
translation.it: voglio riuscire a fare SoulCycle, le scale e le prove in un giorno.

translation.en: [man] Okay. Lit. I'll be right there with you.
translation.it: Ok. Bene. Sarò al tuo fianco.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] And you know, a lot of the choreography
is about feeling, so it's not as technical.
translation.it: è una questione di emozioni, non è tecnica.

translation.en: It's your own personality that brings it to life.
translation.it: È la tua personalità che gli dà vita.

translation.en: And that's hard when you don't feel like yourself.
translation.it: Ed è difficile quando non ti senti te stessa.

translation.en: I had to rebuild my body
translation.it: Ho dovuto ricostruire il mio corpo

translation.en: from cut muscles.
It took me a while to feel confident enough to freak it,
translation.it: Mi ci è voluto un po' per avere la sicurezza  per lasciarmi andare

translation.en: and give it my own personality.
[Beyoncé] In the beginning, it was so many muscle spasms.
Just, internally, my body was not connected.
translation.it: Internamente, il mio corpo non era connesso.

translation.en: My mind was not there.
My mind wanted to be with my children.
translation.it: La mia mente voleva essere con i miei bambini.

translation.en: What people don't see is the sacrifice.
translation.it: La gente non vede il sacrificio.

translation.en: I would dance, and go off to the trailer,
and breastfeed the babies,
and the days I could, I would bring the children.
translation.it: e, nei giorni in cui potevo, portavo i bambini.

translation.en: Like, it gets messy.
Like, it's this-- I'm not even joking, this fast.
Yes.
-[man] It's doable, but... -It's fast.
-[Beyoncé] This is grounding. -[woman] Yes.
[Beyoncé] Like, no matter who you are,
-you get in here, and it's real. -[man] Uh-huh.
-[Beyoncé] Yeah. -[Beyoncé and man laugh]
[man] That's what people don't get. That's why--
translation.it: La gente non sa. Ecco perché...

translation.en: [Beyoncé] That's why people don't like to rehearse.
translation.it: Per questo la gente non ama fare le prove.

translation.en: -You gotta be humble. -[man] Uh-huh.
[Beyoncé] You gotta be willing to look awkward, and...
translation.it: Devi accettare di sembrare ridicolo e...

translation.en: -you gotta study, be a student. -[man laughs]
[panting] I might...
pass out! [laughs]
Five, six. Five, six, let's go.
-[dancers] Hup! -[choreographer] Again.
-[dancers] Hup! -[choreographer] Now release it.
[choreographer] Well, I feel a little of the jerkiness...
translation.it: Sento che un po' della rigidità...

translation.en: is going now.
[Beyoncé] In order for me to meet my goal,
translation.it: Per poter raggiungere il mio obiettivo,

translation.en: I'm limiting myself to no bread, no carbs,
no sugar, no dairy,
no meat, no fish, no alcohol.
[sighs] And I'm hungry.
Just trying to figure out how to balance being a mother of a six-year-old
translation.it: Voglio trovare un equilibrio fra essere madre di una bambina di sei anni

translation.en: and of twins that need me
translation.it: e di una coppia di gemelli che hanno bisogno di me

translation.en: and giving myself creatively
and, um, physically.
It was a lot to juggle.
It's not like before, when I could rehearse,
translation.it: Non è come prima, quando potevo provare,

translation.en: you know, 15 hours straight.
I have children, I have a husband. I have to take care of my body.
translation.it: Ho dei bambini, un marito. Devo prendermi cura del mio corpo.

translation.en: There she is.
Hi, my babies!
Hi, Baba! Hi, baby!
Hi, this is me!
[Beyoncé] I definitely pushed myself further than I knew I could.
translation.it: Ho fatto molto di più di quanto pensassi di poter fare.

translation.en: And I've learned a very valuable lesson--
translation.it: E ho imparato una lezione importante...

translation.en: I will never... [laughs]
...never push myself that far again.
I feel like I'm just a new--
translation.it: Mi sembra di essere una nuova...

translation.en: A new woman, in a new chapter of my life,
translation.it: ...una nuova donna, in un nuovo capitolo della mia vita,

translation.en: and I'm not even trying to be who I was.
translation.it: e non cerco neanche di essere chi ero.

translation.en: It's just so beautiful that children...
translation.it: È così bello che i bambini...

translation.en: do that to you.
-You have to get three turns. -[woman] Okay, best out of three.
translation.it: - Devi fare tre giri. - Ok, il migliore dei tre.

translation.en: Okay, this is seriously a huge accomplishment.
Because I did not think I'd ever get back in my old costume,
translation.it: Non pensavo che sarei entrata nel mio vecchio costume,

translation.en: and I'm actually in it.
And I can still move...
I still have a ways to go, but this makes me feel good,
translation.it: Ho ancora molto da fare, ma mi fa sentire bene,

translation.en: 'cause I've been sacrificing and working hard.
translation.it: perché ho fatto tanti sacrifici e ho lavorato sodo.

translation.en: -Huge, huge, huge accomplishment. Yay! -[man] Ooh!
[man] Are you going to wear it for rehearsals? -No, I'm not! -[man] Okay.
translation.it: - Lo indosserai per le prove? - No!

translation.en: [woman] You're gonna go out to dinner in it?
translation.it: Lo metterai per andare a cena?

translation.en: [Beyoncé] Although, I do wanna tell-- go show Jay. It's a big deal.
translation.it: Ma dico... fallo vedere a Jay. È una conquista!

translation.en: [woman] Why don't you take a walk across the-- [Beyoncé] I ain't walking there. Doing too much.
translation.it: - Perché non passi da... - Non ci vado lì.

translation.en: [man] Hi. Can we talk to Mr. Carter, please?
translation.it: Salve. Possiamo parlare con il sig. Carter?

translation.en: [woman on phone] Of course.
-[Jay] Yup. -I'm back in my costume.
translation.it: - Sì. - Entro di nuovo nel mio costume.

translation.en: All right!
Big deal!
-All right! -It's zipped.
[Beyoncé] All right. Just had to share.
[woman] Why aren't guys as excited?
translation.it: Perché gli uomini non si entusiasmano?

translation.en: Twins, tell 'em.
How are y'all feeling?
How did you wake up this morning?
All right. I want y'all to repeat after me.
♪ I'm feeling myself ♪
Say it.
♪ I'm feeling myself ♪ ♪ I'm feeling myself ♪ -♪ I'm feeling my ♪ -[audience] ♪ Feeling myself ♪
♪ Feeling myself I'm feeling myself, I'm feeling myself ♪
♪ I'm feeling myself I'm feeling myself ♪
-♪ I'm feeling my ♪ -[audience] ♪ Feeling myself ♪
♪ I'm feeling myself, I'm feeling my ♪
[DJ Khalid] Check this out. After Beyoncé perform,
translation.it: Guardate un po'. Dopo l'esibizione di Beyoncé,

translation.en: after she done the decks,
Coachella gotta rename Coachella to Beychella.
New name alert: Beychella.
Y'all know this one, I want y'all to sing along.
translation.it: Questa la conoscete tutti, voglio che cantiate con me.

translation.en: And bop, and bop.
Bop.
I'm Bug a Boo Daddy,
aka "Me, Myself..."
Yo, let's take a group pic, bro. Come on, come on.
translation.it: Facciamo una foto di gruppo. Dai.

translation.en: "...and I." [laughs]
I'm Bug a Boo Up!
Also known as...
♪ Shinin', shinin', shinin', shinin' Yeah ♪
I'm Bug a--
[trills] I'm Bug a Boo "Sweet Dreams,"
translation.it: Sono Bug a Boo Sogni d'Oro,

translation.en: also known as... [blows]
"...Blow."
I'm Bug a Boo "Disappear," also known as...
translation.it: Sono Bug a Boo Scomparso, conosciuto come...

translation.en: ♪ Ave Maria ♪
I'm Bug a Boo "Rocket."
also known as...
♪ If I were a boy ♪
I'm Bug a Boo ♪ We gotta work it out ♪
translation.it: Sono Bug a Boo Dobbiamo trovare una soluzione.

translation.en: -[all] ♪ Hey ♪ -Also known as:
[all] ♪ We like to party ♪
♪ Hey! Let's go! Hey! ♪
-Bug a Boos! Hey! -[all] All together now!
[woman] My name is Edidiong Emah. I am originally from Nigeria,
translation.it: Mi chiamo Edidiong Emah. Sono... ...originaria della Nigeria, sono cresciuta ad Atlanta e...

translation.en: grew up in Atlanta, and...
translation.it: ...originaria della Nigeria, sono cresciuta ad Atlanta e...

translation.en: this dream is something that I never could dream up for myself.
translation.it: ...non osavo sognare che avrei fatto una cosa simile.

translation.en: I couldn't dream this big at all.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a sognare tanto in grande.

translation.en: I never thought I would be here,
translation.it: Non credevo che sarei arrivata qui.

translation.en: thought I would be too short, too thick.
translation.it: Pensavo di essere troppo bassa e grossa.

translation.en: Actually, my whole family went to Morehouse and Spelman,
translation.it: La mia famiglia è andata al Morehouse e allo Spelman,

translation.en: which are HBCUs in Atlanta.
So to do this and...
to have, you know,
the Pan and, you know, sororities and things that...
translation.it: ...l'NPHC e le sorellanze e cose che...

translation.en: Black families value
up on a stage for the world to see and understand us a little bit more...
translation.it: su un palco perché il mondo possa vedere e capirci un po' di più...

translation.en: It's just all a blessing.
I just toss it up,
and catch it in my spirit first, and then real life second.
translation.it: e lo prendo prima nel mio spirito, e poi nella vita reale.

translation.en: [Tessa Thompson] In each of us,
another woman or a young girl might see a reflection of herself;
translation.it: ...un'altra donna o ragazza può vedere sé stessa...

translation.en: of her worth, of her boundless potential.
translation.it: ...il suo valore, il suo potenziale infinito.

translation.en: [Danai Gurira] The youth need to see their greatness reflected in our eyes.
translation.it: I giovani devono vedere la grandezza nei nostri occhi.

translation.en: Go forth. Let them know we're real.
translation.it: Andiamo avanti. Facciamogli vedere che siamo vere.

translation.en: [woman] Well...
I waited 37 weeks...
to be here.
Being pregnant, so...
I didn't dance for a year.
translation.it: ...e non ho ballato per un anno.

translation.en: Looking out there into that crowd, I was overwhelmed
translation.it: Guardando quella folla mi sono sentita sovraccarica...

translation.en: and I feel so honored and so great
translation.it: ...e sono così onorata ed è così bello

translation.en: being a part of something so epic,
translation.it: far parte di una cosa tanto epica,

translation.en: that my son can watch when he's older and...
translation.it: che mio figlio potrà guardare quando sarà grande e...

translation.en: identify with the people, identify with the culture.
translation.it: ...identificarmi con la gente, identificarmi con la cultura.

translation.en: And I'm just so honored to be a part of something
translation.it: Sono così onorata di far parte di qualcosa

translation.en: that he can watch, and be proud of me, and say,
translation.it: che potrà guardare, ed essere fiero di me e dire:

translation.en: "My mom was a part of that, my mom did that."
translation.it: "Mia mamma ha fatto questo e quello".

translation.en: [Beyoncé] It's hard to believe that, after all these years,
translation.it: È difficile credere che dopo tutti questi anni,

translation.en: I was the first African-American woman to headline Coachella.
translation.it: sono stata la prima donna afroamericana a essere la headline di Coachella.

translation.en: It was important to me that everyone
translation.it: Era importante per me che tutti quelli

translation.en: that had never seen themselves represented
translation.it: che non sono mai stati rappresentati

translation.en: felt like they were on that stage with us.
translation.it: si sentissero come se fossero sul palco con noi.

translation.en: As a Black woman,
I used to feel like the world wanted me to stay in my little box.
translation.it: pensavo che il mondo volesse che rimanessi nella mia piccola scatola.

translation.en: And Black women often feel underestimated.
translation.it: Le donne nere spesso si sentono sottovalutate.

translation.en: I wanted us to be proud of not only the show, but...
translation.it: Volevo che fossimo orgogliosi non solo dello show, ma...

translation.en: the process.
Proud of the struggle.
Thankful for the beauty that comes with a painful history
translation.it: Grati per la bellezza generata da una storia dolorosa

translation.en: and rejoice in the pain.
Rejoice in the imperfections and the wrongs that are so damn right.
translation.it: Gioire delle imperfezioni e delle cose sbagliate che sono giuste.

translation.en: And I wanted everyone to feel grateful for their curves,
translation.it: E volevo che tutti fossero grati per le loro curve,

translation.en: their sass, their honesty,
translation.it: per la loro insolenza e onestà,

translation.en: thankful for their freedom.
It was no rules,
and we were able to create a free, safe space
translation.it: e siamo riusciti a creare uno spazio sicuro libero,

translation.en: where none of us were marginalized.
translation.it: in cui nessuno è stato emarginato.

translation.en: [Malcolm X] The most disrespected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.it: La persona a cui si manca più di rispetto in America è la donna nera.

translation.en: [Malcolm X] The most unprotected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.it: La persona meno protetta in America è la donna nera.

translation.en: [Malcolm X] The most neglected person in America is the Black woman.
translation.it: La persona più ignorata in America è la donna nera.

translation.en: Are y'all ready, Coachella?
I wanna see everybody from the front to the back.
translation.it: Voglio vedere tutti, dalla prima all'ultima fila.

translation.en: Put your hand up.
Sing it now, hey! Hey! Hey!
Jump!
Jump!
Let me see you jump.
Here we go!
[man] Three, two, one!
I gotta go home.
-To my fifty-'leven children. -[people laugh]
[Beyoncé] I know I gotta go home.
translation.it: So che devo andare a casa.

translation.en: -[man laughs] -[Beyoncé] He's looking at me like,
"You too lit to quit, it's time to go." [laughs]
translation.it: "Sei troppo forte per mollare, è ora di andare".

translation.en: [woman] He's like, "You do need to quit, ma'am."
Just for shits and giggles, could you do this one, too?
translation.it: - Dice: "Non mollare". - Per divertimento, puoi fare anche questo?

translation.en: [man] You know, yeah. There you go.
-[woman] That's what-- All right, I'm set. -[Beyoncé] Too lit.
[Beyoncé] You know, I respect things that take work.
translation.it: Rispetto le cose che richiedono lavoro.

translation.en: I respect things that are built from the ground up.
translation.it: Rispetto le cose che sono costruite da zero.

translation.en: You know, I'm super specific about every detail.
I personally selected each dancer,
every light, the material on the steps,
translation.it: ogni luce, il materiale delle scale,

translation.en: the height of the pyramid, the shape of the pyramid,
translation.it: l'altezza della piramide, la forma della piramide,

translation.en: every patch was hand sewn.
translation.it: ogni pezza, la canzone di chiusura...

translation.en: Every tiny detail had an intention.
translation.it: Ogni piccolo dettaglio ha uno scopo.

translation.en: There were so many meetings with Olivier...
translation.it: Ho fatto molte riunioni con Olivier...

translation.en: before he flew to Los Angeles
so we could understand, "Okay, why do we want these colors?
translation.it: per capire: "Ok, perché vogliamo questi colori?

translation.en: What do they represent?
What is the silhouette?
What is gonna look the most graphic?
How do we look united?
But how do we have these different characters
translation.it: Ma come mostriamo le personalità distinte

translation.en: that stand out?"
It took months for us to script the show.
translation.it: Ci sono voluti mesi per scrivere lo show.

translation.en: When you spend so many months on choreography and arrangements,
translation.it: Quando passi tanti mesi su coreografie e preparativi,

translation.en: and when there are over 200 people on the stage,
translation.it: e quando ci sono più di 200 persone sul palco,

translation.en: you want to make sure you see everything,
and I was very adamant
that we were well rehearsed and we knew the show
translation.it: sul fatto che fossimo tutti preparati e conoscessimo lo show...

translation.en: front to back.
It was a lot of Steadicam,
and we did things that were very unconventional
translation.it: e abbiamo fatto cose molto anticonvenzionali

translation.en: for a festival show.
I had three soundstages.
There was one soundstage for the band,
translation.it: C'era un teatro di posa per il gruppo musicale,

translation.en: there was one soundstage for dancing,
translation.it: un teatro di posa per la danza,

translation.en: and there was one soundstage for my creative staff.
translation.it: e un teatro di posa per i creativi.

translation.en: And I would go from one to the next.
translation.it: E io andavo da uno all'altro.

translation.en: It takes a huge team, it takes...
translation.it: Ci vuole un team enorme, ci vuole...

translation.en: a village,
and I think we all worked to our limit.
translation.it: e abbiamo tutti dato il massimo.

translation.en: In the rehearsals, I am...
directing and watching the show.
I'm in the audience and I'm able to be on the stage
translation.it: Sono fra il pubblico e sono sul palco

translation.en: and kind of see the stage at the same time.
translation.it: e riesco a vedere il palco allo stesso tempo.

translation.en: After every run-through there's a meeting
translation.it: Dopo ogni prova, c'è una riunione

translation.en: with, you know, at least 50 people,
all of the department heads.
[Beyoncé] Not only does Derek have to record the choir,
translation.it: Derek, non solo registra il coro...

translation.en: he has to record the rumble of the structure, the stomps.
translation.it: ...deve registrare il rumore della struttura, il ritmo sincopato.

translation.en: He has to record everybody's, "Hey! Ah!"
And that adds another element of the performance
translation.it: E quello aggiunge un altro elemento della performance

translation.en: that feels so good on the stage,
translation.it: che è molto bello sul palco,

translation.en: and it's not translating on film.
translation.it: e che il film non trasmette.

translation.en: Until I see some of my notes applied,
translation.it: Fino a quando non mettiamo in atto le mie annotazioni,

translation.en: it doesn't make sense for me to make more.
[Beyoncé] And it doesn't matter how many months we've done it,
translation.it: E non importa per quanti mesi l'abbiamo fatto,

translation.en: how many times we've done it.
There are notes every time,
because there's always something that we can improve upon.
translation.it: perché c'è sempre qualcosa da migliorare.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] Just standing up there, and seeing all the beauty up there,
translation.it: Seduti lì, a vedere la bellezza lassù,

translation.en: and feeling it--
It is the only way I can articulate why I'm frustrated,
translation.it: È l'unico modo in cui riesco a esprimere il motivo della mia frustrazione,

translation.en: because it's not translating on camera.
translation.it: perché la telecamera non trasmette quella bellezza...

translation.en: So my goal is simply that.
Like, it's just so everyone out there can feel what we feel.
translation.it: Perché chi è là fuori senta quello che sentiamo noi.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] And I really have to have dedicated people that are... down for the cause.
translation.it: E devo avere persone dedicate che... si impegnano.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] Whatever it is, let us know what we can prioritize,
translation.it: Fateci sapere a cosa possiamo dare la priorità

translation.en: to try to facilitate everybody's needs
translation.it: per agevolare le necessità di tutti,

translation.en: so we can be done with having to talk so much.
translation.it: così possiamo smettere di parlare tanto.

translation.en: That's where I am.
It's-- We're halfway there.
We just gotta make progress faster, because we're running out of time.
translation.it: Dobbiamo migliorare più velocemente, perché abbiamo poco tempo.

translation.en: Thank you, everybody.
Thank y'all.
I know everybody's working hard, so we'll get there.
translation.it: So che tutti lavorano duramente, e ce la faremo.

translation.en: -[man] All right, have a good anniversary. -[Beyoncé] Good night.
It's my anniversary.
[woman] Happy anniversary.
Okay, guys.
[Beyoncé] Sing it loud!
[Beyoncé] So, if you know this dance... I want you to do it.
Here we go!
I'm talking to you.
I see y'all in the front row.
All right.
Sing it, y'all!
Sing it, y'all.
I see you.
Can I take this back?
Sing it, y'all.
I wanna see y'all do the dance.
You ready?
I'm watching.
Let's see if you know it.
[male singers] ♪ Ten, nine ♪
♪ Eight, seven ♪
♪ Six, five ♪
♪ Four ♪
♪ Three, two, one ♪
[Jay-Z] Coachella, if you're having a good time tonight
make some noise!
[Beyoncé] Give it up for Hova. Hey!
translation.it: Fate un applauso per Hova. Ehi!

translation.en: Here we go!
[man] Question, everybody.
Anybody go to a HBCU?
-[woman 1] Hey! -[woman 2] Yes.
Don't you remember--?
[man] All the HBCU people make some noise!
translation.it: Chi va a una HBCU si faccia sentire!

translation.en: [man] If you tried to go to college, make some noise.
translation.it: Se avete provato ad andare al college, urlate.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
If you dropped out of high school, make some noise!
translation.it: Se avete abbandonato le superiori, urlate!

translation.en: -[small group cheers] -[man] Oh, shit.
[Prof. Cornell West] "Keep on pushing," Curtis Mayfield said.
"Be a force for good," Coltrane said.
translation.it: "Siate una forza del bene", diceva Coltrane.

translation.en: "Mississippi Goddam," says Nina Simone.
That ain't having hope.
That's being a hope.
Courageously bearing witness, regardless of what the circumstances is
translation.it: Essere coraggiosamente testimone, indipendentemente dalle circostanze,

translation.en: because you're choosing to be a kind of person of integrity
translation.it: perché si sceglie di essere una persona con integrità

translation.en: to the best of your ability before the worms get your body.
translation.it: che fa del suo meglio prima che i vermi invadano il corpo.

translation.en: Boom.
[Beyoncé] I know the importance of us feeling we're a part of something,
translation.it: Conosco l'importanza di sentire di far parte di qualcosa,

translation.en: like we're being spoken to, like it's worth it.
translation.it: come avere qualcuno che ci parla perché vale la pena farlo.

translation.en: We all performed with all of our heart, and...
translation.it: Ci siamo esibiti con tutto il cuore e...

translation.en: we performed with love and connection, and...
translation.it: ...ci siamo esibiti con amore e connessione e...

translation.en: we did it together.
I love all of the people that were involved.
translation.it: Amo tutte le persone che hanno partecipato.

translation.en: [man] Homecoming for an HBCU is...
the Super Bowl.
It is the Coachella.
You got all your people coming back that you haven't seen for however long.
translation.it: C'è tutta la gente che torna che non vedi da tanto tempo.

translation.en: You got all this tradition,
you got all these eyeballs wanting to see
translation.it: tutti questi occhi che vogliono vedere

translation.en: if it's gonna be better than the last homecoming.
All those elements are right here.
[woman] We have the Black National Anthem that happens after "Freedom."
translation.it: Abbiamo il Black National Anthem che si canta dopo "Freedom".

translation.en: Message in particular is just a very powerful, very strong message.
translation.it: Il messaggio è molto potente, molto forte.

translation.en: Very inclusive.
But it really makes you proud to be African-American.
translation.it: Ma ti fa sentire orgoglioso di essere afroamericano.

translation.en: [man] I told my dad I joined a sorority.
translation.it: Ho detto a mio papà che sono entrato in una sorellanza.

translation.en: He started dying,
'cause there's so many great sisters in there.
translation.it: perché ci sono delle sorelle fantastiche lì.

translation.en: Great freestylers, of course,
and, you know, we a family. It feels like a college trip.
translation.it: e siamo una famiglia. Sembra una gita scolastica.

translation.en: [in French] Be ready because we are going to put her on blast up there.
translation.it: Fate restare la gente perché la faremo sballare sul palco.

translation.en: we’re going to create shadows for this woman.
She's the best, and I only deal with number ones. Ya heard?
translation.it: È la migliore e io lavoro solo con i numeri uno. Capito?

translation.en: [man, in English] Move in on the side. Here we go. One, two...
[Beyoncé] Creating something that will live beyond me,
something that will make people feel open
translation.it: qualcosa che farà aprire le persone

translation.en: and like they're watching magic,
like they're living in a time that's super special, and...
translation.it: come se vivessero in un periodo che è super speciale, e...

translation.en: like it's a day that they will never relive.
translation.it: ...come se fosse un giorno che non rivivranno più.

translation.en: That's what I want.
[man] Boy, look at that save!
[man] It has been a family environment. I love it.
translation.it: Si è creato un ambiente familiare. Mi piace.

translation.en: I don't even wanna go home after it's over with.
translation.it: Non voglio andare a casa quando finiremo.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] If you know me, you know my family is...
translation.it: Chi mi conosce, sa che la famiglia è...

translation.en: the biggest priority in my life.
My family is my sanctuary,
translation.it: La mia famiglia è il mio santuario,

translation.en: my weakness and my strength.
translation.it: la mia debolezza e la mia forza.

translation.en: They're my tribe, and it was important
translation.it: Sono la mia tribù, ed era importante

translation.en: that we all felt like family.
It just was a dream come true
translation.it: È stato come realizzare un sogno

translation.en: and something I feel like I've worked my entire life for.
translation.it: e qualcosa per cui mi sembra di aver lavorato tutta la vita.

translation.en: And I'm so grateful that I was able to come home.
translation.it: E sono grata di essere riuscita a tornare a casa.

translation.en: [man] We got snares, cymbals, quads, and bass.
translation.it: Abbiamo rullanti, piatti, quad e bassi.

translation.en: It's time for you to get a little taste
translation.it: È ora che sentiate un assaggio

translation.en: of the only drum line
certified by the Queen Bey,
guaranteed to show up and show out,
translation.it: che vi strabilierà e vi conquisterà,

translation.en: on your ass, anytime, anyplace, anywhere.
translation.it: vi farà saltare in piedi, sempre, ovunque, dappertutto.

translation.en: Introducing The Bzzzz.
Coachella, thank you for allowing me
to be the first Black woman to headline Coachella.
translation.it: di essere la prima donna nera a fare da headline.

translation.en: Ain't that 'bout a bitch?
This song is dedicated to all the incredible women
translation.it: Questa canzone è dedicata a tutte le donne incredibili

translation.en: that opened up the doors for me.
translation.it: che hanno aperto delle porte per me.

translation.en: Thank you so much, ladies.
Do we have any strong women out there tonight?
translation.it: Ci sono delle donne forti qui stasera?

translation.en: -Sing along! -["Run The World" plays]
Here we go!
[Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie] We teach girls to shrink themselves, to make themselves smaller.
translation.it: Insegniamo alle ragazze a farsi sempre più piccole.

translation.en: We say to girls, "You can have ambition, but not too much."
translation.it: Diciamo alle ragazze: "Potete avere ambizione, ma non troppa".

translation.en: You should aim to be successful, but not too successful,
translation.it: Dovreste ambire ad avere successo, ma non troppo,

translation.en: otherwise, you will threaten the man.
We raise girls to see each other as competitors.
translation.it: Le ragazze crescono pensando di essere rivali...

translation.en: Not for jobs or for accomplishments, but for the attention of men.
translation.it: ...non per lavori o traguardi, ma per l'attenzione degli uomini.

translation.en: Feminist:
a person who believes in the social, political,
translation.it: una persona che crede nell'uguaglianza sociale, politica

translation.en: and economic equality of the sexes.
Everybody, give it up for the beautiful Kelly.
translation.it: Fate un applauso per la bellissima Kelly.

translation.en: -And the beautiful Michelle. -We love you.
translation.it: - E per la bellissima Michelle. - Vi adoriamo.

translation.en: My girl B is killing it tonight!
translation.it: La mia B è fantastica stasera!

translation.en: I'm so happy y'all are here tonight.
Do y'all remember this song?
Sing it, y'all!
Let's go!
Please give it up for Destiny's Child!
translation.it: Fate un applauso per le Destiny's Child!

translation.en: Give it up one more time for my best friends!
translation.it: Un altro applauso per le mie migliori amiche!

translation.en: That's my best friends.
Everybody say, "Hey, Mrs. Carter."
[audience] Hey, Mrs. Carter.
[Beyoncé] I'm just checking to make sure y'all still out there.
translation.it: Controllavo che ci foste ancora tutti.

translation.en: All the way in the back say, "Hey, Mrs. Carter."
translation.it: Anche là in fondo dite: "Ehi, signora Carter".

translation.en: [audience] Hey, Mrs. Carter!
Okay.
To my right say, "Hey, Mrs. Carter."
translation.it: Alla mia destra dite: "Ehi, signora Carter".

translation.en: [audience] Hey, Mrs. Carter!
To my left say, "Hey, Mrs. Carter."
translation.it: Alla mia sinistra dite: "Ehi, signora Carter".

translation.en: [audience] Hey, Mrs. Carter!
[Beyoncé] Everybody put your hands together like this.
Everybody put your hands together.
Yeah.
Now everybody say,
"Hey." [Beyoncé and audience chanting] Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey.
Even louder. "Hey, hey, hey."
Say, "I ain't worried, doin' me tonight." Sing.
translation.it: Dite: "I ain't worried, doin' me tonight". Cantate.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] Louder.
♪ A little sweat ain't never hurt nobody ♪ Sing.
-Sing. -♪ While y'all standin' on the wall ♪
Sing. "Get me bodied."
-Sing. -♪ Get me bodied ♪
♪ You want my body ♪ Sing.
Yeah! Ladies and gentlemen,
please give it up for Solange!
Give it up for my sister!
All right, now.
Everybody put your hands together.
Do we have any single ladies in the house tonight?
translation.it: Ci sono signorine single qui stasera?

translation.en: -Now, wait. -[band stops]
I want y'all to get nice and stanky with me.
translation.it: Voglio che facciate i bravi e facciate lo Stanky.

translation.en: Where I'm from...
we do things nice and stanky.
translation.it: ...si fanno le cose bene e stanky.

translation.en: We do things nice...
and funky.
Can y'all repeat after me? You ready?
translation.it: Potete ripetere dopo di me? Pronti?

translation.en: Say, "Hey."
Now wait.
You still ain't stanking enough for me.
Sing.
♪ Don't be mad when you see That he want it ♪ I see you.
I love y'all.
-Yeah! -[people cheer]
Beautiful job, Baba.
-You sound so pretty! -I wanna do it again.
translation.it: - Hai una bella voce. - Voglio farlo di nuovo.

translation.en: Oh, you wanna do it again? You're like Mommy, huh?
translation.it: Vuoi farlo di nuovo? Sei come la mamma?

translation.en: I wanna do that again.
-[Beyoncé laughs] Okay. -'Cause it feels good!
Okay. If you want to, go. Lift every voice and sing.
translation.it: Ok. Se vuoi farlo, vai. Tira fuori la voce e canta.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] I feel we made something
that made my daughter proud.
Made my mother proud, my father proud,
translation.it: Ho reso mia madre e mio padre orgogliosi.

translation.en: I mean, and all of the people that are my brothers and sisters around the world,
translation.it: E tutte le persone che sono miei fratelli e mie sorelle nel mondo,

translation.en: and that's why I live.
translation.it: ed è la mia ragione di vita.

translation.en: I'm so lucky and grateful that I'm able to take all these crazy ideas
translation.it: Sono fortunata e grata di poter prendere queste idee folli

translation.en: and actually make it into something that heals people
translation.it: e trasformarle in qualcosa che guarisce le persone

translation.en: and that may spark vision in people.
translation.it: e che ispira in loro una visione.

translation.en: That shows them to dream big,
translation.it: Che insegna alla gente a far grandi sogni,

translation.en: that shows them that they are limitless.
translation.it: a dimostrare alle persone che non hanno limiti.

translation.en: It's possible.
If my country ass can do it, they can do it.
translation.it: Se posso farlo io, possono farlo anche loro.

translation.en: [Maya Angelou] That's nice. I've never been asked that question.
translation.it: È bello. Non mi hanno mai fatto quella domanda.

translation.en: Joy. Brings me joy.
♪ Put a rainbow in the clouds ♪
translation.it: Metti un arcobaleno fra le nuvole.

translation.en: I want to--
What I really want to do...
is be a representative of my race, of the human race.
translation.it: ...è rappresentare la mia razza, la razza umana.

translation.en: I have a chance...
to show how kind we can be,
how intelligent and generous we can be.
I have a chance to-- to teach, and...
and to love, and to laugh, and--
I know that when I'm finished doing what I'm sent here to do,
translation.it: Quando porterò a termine il compito che mi è stato affidato,

translation.en: I will be called home.
And I will go home without any fear
or trepidation,cause I'm
wondering what's gonna happen.
[man] And...
what advice would you have
to give this generation?
[Maya Angelou] Tell the truth.
To yourself first.
translation.it: Prima di tutto a voi stessi.

translation.en: And to the children.
Live in the present.
Don't deny the past.
Live in the present and know the charge on you
translation.it: Vivete nel presente e sappiate che è vostro dovere...

translation.en: is to make this country more than it is today.
translation.it: ...rendere questo Paese migliore di quanto sia oggi.

translation.en: [Beyoncé] I want to sing this last song
to all of my incredible,
beautiful fans,
loyal fans, ride or-dies.
translation.it: leali, nel bene e nel male.

translation.en: It's dedicated to my incredible Beyhive.
translation.it: È dedicata ai miei incredibili Beyhive.

translation.en: -♪ Baby ♪ It's your turn. -[audience] ♪ You're the one I love ♪
-[Beyoncé] Sing it. -♪ You're the one I need ♪
[Beyoncé] Louder.
Coachella, thank you so much.I love you.
Please give it up for my incredible,
translation.it: Fate un applauso per il mio incredibile...

translation.en: incredible crew on this stage.
My female dancers.
Give it up now.
[Beyoncé] Go on, ladies.
Give it up for my male dancers.
translation.it: Un applauso per i miei ballerini.

translation.en: Please give it up for Larry and Laurent, Les Twins.
translation.it: Fate un applauso per Larry e Laurent, Les Twins.

translation.en: Please give it up for my incredible background singers.
translation.it: Fate un applauso per i miei coristi.

translation.en: Please give it up for my beautiful orchestra.
translation.it: Un applauso per la bellissima orchestra.

translation.en: Please give it up for my drum line.
Please give it up for my crew.
translation.it: Un applauso per il mio team,

translation.en: That is everyone behind the scenes
that worked tirelessly, tirelessly to put this show together.
translation.it: che ha lavorato incessantemente per organizzare questo show.

translation.en: We love you.
Thank you to my family that's here tonight.
translation.it: Grazie alla mia famiglia che è qui stasera.

translation.en: Have a beautiful night. I love you from the bottom of my heart.
translation.it: Passate una bella serata. Vi amo con tutto il cuore.

translation.en: God bless you. Good night.
I love you.
Peace.
Boom. [laughs]
-Well, ba-damn. -[all laugh]
Well, okay, ladies.
Can you dig it?
This is what we're doing now, with two weeks till the show.
translation.it: Questo è quello che facciamo ora, a due settimane dallo show.

translation.en: He's walking an invisible dog and looking like Elton John.
translation.it: Porta a spasso un cane invisibile e sembra Elton John.

translation.en: It is-- The theme of the show is homecoming,
translation.it: È... Il tema dello show è l'homecoming,

translation.en: which is very ironic, as none of us are ever going home.
translation.it: ed è ironico perché nessuno di noi torna mai a casa.

translation.en: Is this the shot?
The day has finally come!
-Let the games begin! -Coachella!
Coachella, baby!
-Let's go, baby! -[screams]
Let's go! We ready!
We ready.
♪ Watch me fuck up Coachella ♪
♪ Before I let, before I let Before I let go ♪
